name: ambros-release
description: Automates the Ambros release workflow: version bumping, tagging, and pushing to origin
author: Ambros Team

commands.name: version
commands.description: Show the current version of Ambros

commands.name: status
commands.description: Show release status (current version, branch, uncommitted changes)

commands.name: bump
commands.description: Bump the version (major, minor, or patch)

commands.name: tag
commands.description: Create and push a tag for the current version

commands.name: push
commands.description: Push the current branch and tags to origin

commands.name: create-branch
commands.description: Create a release branch for the current version

commands.name: release
commands.description: Full release workflow (bump, commit, tag, branch, push)
